task.title: How to Start a Spotify Jam
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about starting a Spotify Jam.

step.cmd: Begin playing a song on your Spotify mobile app.
Tap the Connect to a Device icon.
Hit Start a Jam and then Share link to invite your friends to a Spotify listening party.
Share the link via WhatsApp, Instragram, Chrome, etc.

taskbody.result: Your friends can join your jam and start adding songs to the playlist for a group listening session.
